attributes.title: horrible experience
attributes.review: As a person that wanted to support our great president i would like to say that this app was a horrible experience right when i opened it my parents came to my room saying they were getting a divorce, and i have every right to asume that this was none other than our president Donald trump’s fault.

attributes.title: EWW!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app on the appstore. It does NOT deserve even one star. I downloaded this app, and immediately when I opened it I saw horrible things! There’s were many graphic and nude images of trump! my grandma also downloaded this app, and hers made her whole phone shut down! We had to call apple to fix it. Please, never get this app

attributes.title: Horribly Cursed
attributes.review: When I opened the app I thought I would be able to support my 🥰🤡💕💕🧚🏻‍♀️Wöñdérfūł💞🧚🏻‍♀️🤡💕 president. BUT I COME TO FIND OUT that AS SOON AS I downloaded this app it had GLITCHED ME OUT THE AUDACITY!!!! 😡😡😡 I’ve never been so disappointed in my LIFE! On top of that as soon as I downloaded this app I mediately started to HAVE UNFORTUNATE things happen. No no I do not recommend this app you will only be disappointed.

attributes.title: 🤢🤢TRUMP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Trump is not my president and will never be one term is enough!!! Trump is ugly, nasty 🤢, orange ,racist, rude and expects people to treat him good when he doesn’t even treat us good!! UH NO!! How do people support him and take him in as a president like no!! He is a clown 🤡🤡🤡, a roach, an Oompa Loompa and is a disgrace to the world!! So when bunker boy I not president anymore I will be happy. I am spitting facts out!! You are a clown 🤡🤡🤡🤡 and you belong in a circus 🎪!!! 🤢🤢🤢🤡🤡🤡🤡🤮🤮💩💩💩

attributes.title: sincerely, disappointed
attributes.review: so disappointed in our KING’s 🤡 technology. how could he do this to us? america isn’t great when this app curses our patriots!! wish he could see this because i am just such a fan of his orange complexion. i specifically downloaded this app for tips on how to be a real life cheeto. i guess this is the wrong app for that 😔

attributes.title: No🙈
attributes.review: What is this honey...I was shocked I was in tears almost. So I was on the app like 👁👄👁. And I saw things I didn’t like. This app gives me bad vibes... it’s giving me very much all lives matter vibes and blue lives matter vibes(not the smurf lives btw). Uh-un and they had a white refrigerator, I was like not a white refrigerator honey. In conclusion terrible it’s horrible...I tried to rate it a 0 but I couldn’t.

attributes.title: My children have gone brain dead 😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my lovely, non-racist president but as soon as I downloaded my children dropped dead in the floor. I took them to the hospital only to find out they were brain dead! Who’s going to pay for my medical bills??Tgese hospital wages aren’t going to pay themselves. I demand answers and I demand them NOW!!1🤬🤬

attributes.title: Terrible application
attributes.review: The application keeps glitching and signing me out, and there are so much spam texts and calls. I haven’t received campaign news and the only way to do so was if I logged on to the application. Last, I won an award in app however it didn’t allow me to claim it because it glitched and logged me off!!

attributes.title: I don’t know if it’s just me
attributes.review: I’m not sure what’s going on. I installed the app because I was receiving positive feedback from it. After installed and opened, the app was unbelievably glitchy and overall made my phone run much slower. I’ll keep the app on my phone and try again, but my phone cannot take much more!

attributes.title: If I could I wouldn’t even give it a star
attributes.review: I just wanted to be more aware of what was going on as a devoted American and I was truly disappointed with the function of the app the quality is horrible and it had lead to many glitches in my system I am truly disappointed and was hoping for it to be better instead of ✨D I S G U S T I N G✨
